thread.title: Minister on Russian tourist visas: Make it easier - it will be good for tourism
thread.title_full: Minister on Russian tourist visas: Make it easier - it will be good for tourism

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: Minister on Russian tourist visas: Make it easier - it will be good for tourism
text:
Minister on Russian tourist visas: Make it easier - it will be good for tourism   
Aug 14, 2015 Banners   
The Russian Ministry of Culture supports the idea of liberalizing visa regulations for foreign tourists, and this issue will be raised at the State Council. This was announced by Russian Culture Minister Vladimir Medinsky said Thursday. 
According to the minister, countries that have eased their visa regulations have seen a significant tourism increase. 
"Of course, we believe that this would positively affect the tourism industry," he said, adding that the planned proposals envision allowing a visa-free 72-hour stay for transit tourists from a number of countries.
